Name: Never pause at exceptions
Description: Can I prevent the debugger to not stop at exceptions on a line?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes: 1. In **Sources**, right click on the line number that throws an exception and select "Never pause here".
Chrome.Name: Never pause at exceptions
